other_tests.findings: Profound QT prolongation with a corrected QT interval (QTc) of 712 ms and intermittent 2:1 atrioventricular (AV) block. During 1:1 conduction, macroscopic T-wave alternans were observed.
A L179F (C535T) missense mutation in SCN4B was identified, which cosegregated properly throughout a 3-generation pedigree and was absent in 800 reference alleles.
